title: Minecraft PC/Mac 正版销量达到2500万
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2017-1-4 09:53 编辑 


Searge：Wow, more than 25m copies of Minecraft PC were sold. That's an amazing and really big number. https://minecraft.net/en/stats/
Searge：哇！已经超过2500万份Minecraft PC版被卖出去了！这可是个惊人而且不小的数字！             https://minecraft.net/en/stats/


2200万：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-538016-1-1.html

replies.author: 米阳
replies.txt_content: 祝贺！耶！

replies.txt_content: 小明！快来告诉我“M”是什么单位

数完才知道是million。。。
